author: Paris Martineau
title: Record Jobless Claims Are Overwhelming States’ Aging Tech
description: Laid-off workers struggle to file claims for unemployment benefits; economists say the situation will likely get worse.
content: Christine Cemelli was at home on March 16 when she got the text. Her husband, a chef at a fine-dining restaurant in New Jersey, had been laid off. Earlier that day, Governor Phil Murphy had signed an executive order restricting the operations of non-essential… [+4054 chars]
